title: Equifax breach
extract: A huge security breach at credit reporting company Equifax has exposed sensitive information, such as Social Security numbers and addresses, of up to 143 million Americans. ... Equifax (EFX) is one of three nationwide credit-reporting agencies that track and rate the financial history of consumers.Sep 10, 2017
